description: Complete coverage of the 2018 Olympic Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
title: Winter Olympics 2018
title_page: Winter Olympics 2018 - The New York Times
maintext:
Nathan Chen Is Winning by Not Trying So Hard to Win
Chen was fixated on winning an Olympic gold medal in 2018 and was crushed when he didnâ€™t. Learning that there is more to life than skating, he says, has made him a better skater.
